name: World War 3 Tower Defense
description:
World War 3 Tower Defense is here! Ready for the ultimate Tower Defense game? Engage in epic battles across multiple countries and continents! Will you become the next World War 3 general? Here are some of the main features of this game :

- High-quality graphics!

- Exciting campaign mode with many different levels to conquer!

- Engaging gameplay, upgrades, different enemy armies.

- Realistic sound effects and uprising music soundtrack.

- Easy to play.

- 360-degree camera with ultra 3D zoom

Enjoy!

A game by Studio 87 - An Independent Development Studio
